data.description:
Cactus Cowboy Returns in His Most Thrilling VR Adventure Yet – "Desert Warfare"!

At an excavation site close to the Bug Land border, a mysterious cave is uncovered when the Bug Army launches a sudden assault. They're after something that is inside the cave, something so precious that it sparks an all-out war.
Step into the role of Cactus Cowboy, pushing back against the Bug Army and revealing the sinister plans of their leaders.
![{"height":1373,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75269596_777223404382054_806405602851347642_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=L1TkpL_ZaVkQ7kNvgGqDChG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDq1pH0NcpEM_C0NMAE7jvQwioDjRm_0zpKLTIcV-jE1w&oe=66A4BF3F)
Dive into an action-packed VR experience that will leave an indelible mark on your memory!

Features:

•	Immersive VR first-person shooter

•	8h campaign

•	Over 12 unique VR guns with manual reloading

•	Customize your guns with scopes, grips, and lasers

•	Reunite with old friends and confront new foes

•	Discover Cacti Town and visit the gunshop

•	Over 30 weapon skins to unlock.

•	Battles underground, in the air, and on the desert plains.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2007}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974829_1068926054174681_345617964768237666_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=O6ePNRjK0_IQ7kNvgEZ_zT5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvHWAPjWl3uws-eBN8I4jRtAamxygoWRs3WV8jVXbNFQ&oe=66A4D6E4)

But that's not all! Cactus Cowboy - Desert Warfare continues to received free updates, expanding the game. 

On land and water and in the air, the Cacti Army is ready to fight!

changelog.change_log:
Add: Soil and Water Music Stage
Fix: Typos in subtitles
Fix: Bug that can cause the player to be stuck in a loading screen

General:

Add: Solo Mission 03 - Infested - Part 01/03
Add: Solo Mission 03 - Infested - Part 02/03
Add: Solo Mission 03 - Infested - Part 03/03
Add: Guido Cactus to the Cacti Wiki
Add: RPG Cactus to the Cacti Wiki
Add: Main Menu entry for Infested Mission


Fix: Cacti Wiki broke in last patch
Fix: C04L01 Desert Monsters restricted to spawn more than 2 at the same time
Fix: Oil Rig texture in Solo Mission 01
Fix: Helicopter dust in Solo Mission 01
Fix: Recoilsystem with two handed guns now working linear as intended
Fix: C04L02 Window occlusion fix
Fix: C03L03 Briefing dialog 5sec silence removed
Fix: Enemies trying to leave the walkable area
Fix: SFX did not play when stepping on radio active puddles
Fix: AR01 Animation fix in Gun Wiki
Fix: A explosion didn't have 3D audio

Patch02 Notes

General:
Add: New mini mission "The bridge"
Add: Gun Wiki
Add: CC History Wiki
Add: Additional Content to main menu
Add: Cactipedia to main menu
Add: C03L03 unlocks Solo Missions in Additional Content Menu
Add: C03L03 General Cacti speech about Solo Missions
Fix: Main menu restructure -> Extras renamed to Additional Content with more sub menus
Fix: Bug that would let the player spawn in crouch mode on
Fix: Voice line in C01L02 rerecorded
Fix: C02L01 invisible wall removed

Quest 3 Exclusive
Fix: Higher texture resolution. Sharp as never before on mobile VR

General:
Add: New mini mission "Cornered" to Extras Menu
Add: New gameplay option Virtual Gun Stock
Add: Remote grab training obsticle

Fix: Recoil SMG03
Fix: Rocket Remote not fireing at target in C01L03
Fix: Typo in intructions poster
Fix: Unlimited ammo bug
Fix: C04L02 debug text can be seen
Fix: Minigun cause cause controller not to stop vibrating

Quest 3 Exclusive:
Add: More tru touch haptics for guns, damage and heart beat

Add: TruTouch Haptic Support
Fix: AK Laser Pointer not working
Fix: NPC getting stuck in C08L02
Fix NPC getting stuck in C4L3

* Added Fixed Height Option
* Added Helga Auto Heal Option
* More Quest 3 performance improvements
* Added duck button
* Hopefully fixed a bug where menus become inoperable

Day1 Patch fixes
Quest 3 improvements added
Fix: Controller vibration won't stop on some occasions during prologue
Fix: Prologue player helmet can now be removed (manually by the player) addressing CertOps suggestion for comfort
Fix: Several floating objects
Fix: Spelling + Typo fixed in Subtitles and Credits
Fix: Menu items like shops and hand menu could become inoperable
Fix: Shooting animation MG01
Fix: Enemy voice lines did not play on lev 18
Fix: Z-Fighting during prologue and C01L03

Balance: Recoil fix for auto pistol
Balance: Higher bullet damage on smg02
Balance: Hard difficulty adjusted
Balance: Max health for sniper adjust -10

Adjust: Voice line prologue. Added rank to npc introduction talk
Minor bug fixes reported from beta testers.
